summary.overview: Lecture: L1b - Cartesian Coordinates. This lecture covers the following key concepts: - Animation typically involves interpolation, keyframe and easing. - Coordinate typically involves cartesian, polar and spherical. - Rotation typically involves quaternion, euler angles and axis-angle. - Numerical Values is an important concept in this lecture. Students should be able to explain these concepts and apply them to simple problems and examples.
